successes.title:
WigWag:
Automatic Starts Here
successes.description:
WigWag delivers a powerful, simple
platform to make connected devices more manageable, secure and automatic.

Pledges.description: UPDATE ME  • Receive updates from this project and help us get closer to our goal. (Great for anyone who just wants to help out!)
EARLY BIRD SENSOR KIT • 1 Sensor Block + 1 Relay. This sensor kit will enable you to get started monitoring, measuring and controlling your world.

EARLY BIRD LIGHTING KIT • 1 Glowline +1 Relay. Our light kit will brighten any space and give you complete control of the color.  (Each Glowline comes with 2.5 meters of color LED strip lighting, upgradable to 5M at the end of the campaign.)

SENSOR KIT • 1 Sensor Block + 1 Relay. This sensor kit will enable you to get started monitoring, measuring and controlling your world. Make it SMS you, Tweet, and automatically control other devices in your home or office.

LIGHTING KIT • 1 Glowline Strip Controller +1 Relay. Our light kit will brighten any space and give you complete control of the color.  (Each Glowline comes with 2.5 meters of color LED strip lighting, upgradeable to 5M at the end of the campaign.)

EARLY BIRD ROOM KIT (PICK 2) • 1 Relay + mix and match two: Sensor Block(s) or Glowline(s).  Choose 2 Sensor Blocks to try out "Sensor Fusion", cover a larger area,  or the "IR Trip Wire" between two blocks.  Chose Glowlines to outfit an entire room with LED lighting.  Chose one of each to start building dynamic environments.  (Each Glowline comes with 2.5 meters of color LED strip lighting, upgradeable to 5M at the end of the campaign.)

ROOM KIT (PICK 2) • 1 Relay + mix and match 2 (at checkout): Sensor Block(s) or Glowline(s).  Choose 2 Sensor Blocks to try out "Sensor Fusion", cover a larger area,  or the "IR Trip Wire" between two blocks.  Chose 2 Glowlines to outfit an entire room with LED lighting.  Chose one of each to start building dynamic environments.  (Each Glowline comes with 2.5 meters of color LED strip, upgradeable to 5M at the end of the campaign.)

DEVELOPER KIT • Hello Makers, Let us help you make it Wag...  1 Arduino Shield + 1 Raspberry Pi Shield + 1 Experimenter Board + 1 Relay + 1 Sensor Block.  Ready to go development kit to get you started mashing up your custom hardware with WigWag.

EARLY BIRD MULTI-ROOM KIT (PICK 4) • You're serious and so are we! 1 Relay + mix and match 4 (at checkout): Sensor Block(s) or Glowline(s).  Really get started sensing and controlling multiple rooms.  Perfect to try out our location based "sensor fusion" and app control.   (Each Glowline comes with 2.5 meters of color LED strip, upgradeable to 5M.)

MULTI-ROOM KIT (PICK 4) • You're serious and so are we! 1 Relay + mix and match 4 (at checkout): Sensor Block(s) or Glowline(s).  Really get started sensing and controlling multiple rooms.  Perfect to try out our location based "sensor fusion" and app control.   (Each Glowline comes with 2.5 meters of color LED strip, upgradeable to 5M at the end of the campaign.)

HOME KIT (PICK 10) • More sensors = More Intelligence, and you know it! 1 Relay + mix and match 10 (at checkout): Sensor Block(s) or Glowline(s).  Perfect to outfit your whole house with sensing and lighting control. (Each Glowline comes with 2.5 meters of color LED strip, upgradeable to 5M at the end of the campaign.)

MAKE IT WAG • Lets face it, you know what you want, and we want to help you make it happen. WigWag will work with you to make your custom project completely functioning via our App and participating in Rules.  Contact us first - Lets talk!
